column4: anyone know EXACTLY What usplash does? Is it the splashscreen that shows the "ubuntu" loading in orange and black?
usplash draws the progress to the kernel framebuffer device during bootup, before X has loaded.  You can  apt-get source usplash   to get the source code
would you know a guide to services and what they do? I'm trying to uninstall as many services that I don't need as I can
it shows different logos depending on what is configured (eg. ubuntu, kubuntu, edubuntu, xubuntu or a custom logo scheme)
